title: Great location for business near 3rd ring road
text:
We spent 3 nights here in March. It's close to the 3rd ring road and a metro stop. The breakfast buffet was very extensive with a lot of western and chinese dishes available. The coffee shop was much better value with sandwiches, coffee and amazing desserts available.
The service was very good and even the toilet was entertaining.
The bar was also fun for happy hour from 5pm-7pm.
The "fog" really smog, was bad the last day and we were even surprised how much it affected us. The hotel will get you masks if you ask.
